primary_color_desc: Choose primary color of the app.
accent_color_desc: Choose accent color of the app.
note_color_desc: Color indicating if a note is present.
about_what: This app is linked to the agenda of the University of Le Mans, Tours and Rennes. It allow you to have direct access to your calendar on your device without having to connect to the ENT.
author: Author
changelog_desc: See the changelog of the app
intro_welcome_desc: MyAgenda allows you to access the University of Le Mans, Tours or Rennes calendar directly on your device !
intro_login_desc: Access to the calendars is reserved for students, so you must login. Just select your university and enter the same credentials you use for the ENT.
intro_agenda_desc: In the settings, you can choose your department, year and group to display the corresponding calendar.
intro_customization_desc: Choose between a light or dark theme but also the colors of the application! Make the application unique with 35720 possible color combinations.
intro_note_desc: You can add notes on a course. A color will appear on the side, it is also customizable in the settings.
intro_event_desc: You can add your own event to the calendar and give it a special color. For example: An appointment with a teacher.
intro_offline_desc: Once your calendar has been loaded at least once, it will be backed up for offline use.
error_end_time_text: The end time availability must be after the start time !
confirm_event_delete_text: By deleting this event, you will can't get it back.
findroom_noresult_text: No room is available. Or there is no data for rooms of this department.
courses_noresult_text: Try to edit number of weeks in settings.
help_noresult_text:
Check your internet connection.
It's also possible that the server is down.
network_error: Network error! Check your internet connection.
no_email_app:
No email client :/
Please install email app like Gmail.
change_agenda_text: Do you want to change your actual agenda ?
supportme_text:
This page allows you to reward all the work done to create and maintain MyAgenda.

You can look / click on the ad or make a PayPal donation of the amount of your choice to support me.

Tips: Register on Unidays to take advantage of discounts on many sites (Apple, Cdiscount, Fnac, Darty, ASSOS, etc.).

Thank you.
